TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringReader extends System.IO.TextReader

span.span: Implements a that reads from a string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可讓您以同步或非同步方式讀取字串。 enables you to read a string synchronously or asynchronously. 您可以使用一次讀取一個字元或方法中，於使用行或方法與整個字串使用或方法。You can read a character at a time with the or the method, a line at a time using the or the method and an entire string using the or the method. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案的屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式讀取整個字串。The following example shows how to read an entire string asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReader#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReader#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/vb/example2.vb#2)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案的屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#2)]

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Close ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Close ()
public: override void Close();

span.span: Closes the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需建立檔案，並將文字寫入至檔案的範例，請參閱[How to： 將文字寫入至檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 從檔案讀取文字的範例，請參閱[How to： 從檔案讀取文字](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 如需讀取和寫入二進位檔案的範例，請參閱[如何： 讀取和寫入至新建立資料檔](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 這項實作`Close`呼叫方法傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 清除資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 設定至`true`表示從緩衝區資料流，清除資料，但並不會清除編碼器狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器將保存其狀態 （部分字元），讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 這種情況下會影響 UTF8 及 UTF7 其中某些字元可以只編碼的編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元之後。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 呼叫`Close`，其他方法可能會擲回例外狀況。Following a call to `Close`, other methods might throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Peek ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Peek() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Peek () As Integer
public: override int Peek();

summary.span: 傳回下一個可供使用的字元，但不使用它。

span.span: Returns the next available character but does not consume it.

returns.span: 整數，表示要讀取的下一個字元，如果沒有更多字元可供使用或資料流不支援搜尋，則為 -1。

span.span: An integer representing the next character to be read, or -1 if no more characters are available or the stream does not support seeking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回整數值，以判斷是否發生檔案或另一項錯誤的結尾。The method returns an integer value in order to determine whether the end of the file, or another error has occurred. 這可讓使用者能夠先檢查 是否傳回的值為-1 的之前先將它轉換型別。This allows a user to first check if the returned value is -1 before casting it to a type. 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 目前的位置`StringReader`不會變更這項作業。The current position of the `StringReader` is not changed by this operation. 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.||

span.span: The current reader is closed.

summary.span: 自輸入字串讀取下一個字元或下一組字元。

span.span: Reads the next character or next set of characters from the input string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Integer
public: override int Read();

summary.span: 自輸入字串讀取下一個字元，並將字元位置前移一個字元。

span.span: Reads the next character from the input string and advances the character position by one character.

returns.span: 基礎字串的下一個字元；如果不再有字元可供使用，則為 -1。

span.span: The next character from the underlying string, or -1 if no more characters are available.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 index 與 (index + count - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between index and (index + count - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.
The starting index in the buffer.
The number of characters to read.

summary.span: 自輸入字串讀取字元區塊，並將字元位置前移 個字元。

span.span: Reads a block of characters from the input string and advances the character position by .

returns.span: 讀入緩衝區的字元總數。

span.span: The total number of characters read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前無法提供那麼多的字元數，則這個數目可能小於所要求的字元數，或如果已經到達基礎字串的末端，則為零。

span.span: This can be less than the number of characters requested if that many characters are not currently available, or zero if the end of the underlying string has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 此方法會讀取最多`count`字元到`buffer`位置開始的字元陣列`index`。The method will read up to `count` characters from the into the `buffer` character array starting at position `index`. 傳回實際的字元數所讀取，或如果已達到字串的結尾，且會讀取任何字元零。Returns the actual number of characters read, or zero if the end of the string has been reached and no characters are read. 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask<int> ReadAsync (Memory<char> buffer, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1<int32> ReadAsync(valuetype System.Memory`1<char> buffer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int> ReadAsync (char[] buffer, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int32> ReadAsync(char[] buffer, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ReadAsync (buffer As Char(), index As Integer, count As Integer) As Task(Of Integer)
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<int> ^ ReadAsync(cli::array <char> ^ buffer, int index, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 index 與 (index + count - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的字元取代的指定字元陣列。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified character array with the values between index and (index + count - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current source.

param.name: index
param.span: 「緩衝區」中要開始寫入的位置。

span.span: The position in buffer at which to begin writing.

param.name: count

span.span: The maximum number of characters to read.

param.span: 如果指定的字元數寫入緩衝區之前，便到達字串末端，則方法會返回。

span.span: If the end of the string is reached before the specified number of characters is written into the buffer, the method returns.

summary.span: 從目前的字串非同步讀取指定的取大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current string asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達字串末端，則可能為 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the string has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在工作完成之後指定的字元數目`count`參數讀取或字串的結尾為止。The task completes after either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read or the end of the string is reached. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式讀取字串的第一次 23 個字元。The following example shows how to read the first 23 characters of a string asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.stringreader/vb/example1.vb#1)]

or is negative.

exception.span: 和 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The string reader has been disposed.

exception.span: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

span.span: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.

span.span: The position in buffer at which to begin writing.

param.name: count

span.span: The maximum number of characters to read.

param.span: 如果指定的字元數寫入緩衝區之前，便到達字串末端，則方法會返回。

span.span: If the end of the string is reached before the specified number of characters is written into the buffer, the method returns.

summary.span: 從目前的字串非同步讀取指定的取大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current string asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達字串末端，則可能為 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the string has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作未完成，直到指定的字元數目`count`會讀取參數，或已經到達字串結尾。The task does not complete until either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read, or the end of the string has been reached.

span.span: is .
or is negative.

exception.span: 和 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

span.span: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The string reader has been disposed.

exception.span: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用讀取器。

span.span: The reader is currently in use by a previous read operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ReadLine ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ReadLine() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ReadLine () As String
public: override System::String ^ ReadLine();

summary.span: 自目前字串讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

span.span: Reads a line of characters from the current string and returns the data as a string.

returns.span: 目前字串的下一行，如果已到達字串的結尾，則為 。

span.span: The next line from the current string, or if the end of the string is reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 一條線被定義為一串字元後面接著行摘要 ("\n")、 ("\r") 的歸位字元或歸位字元後面緊跟著行摘要 ("\r\n")。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 所傳回的字串沒有結尾的歸位字元或換行字元。The string that is returned does not contain the terminating carriage return or line feed. 傳回的值是`null`如果已經到達字串結尾。The returned value is `null` if the end of the string has been reached. 如果目前的方法會擲回，基礎字串中的讀取器的位置進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經讀入內部的字元數緩衝區會被捨棄。If the current method throws an , the reader's position in the underlying string is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 已讀取的字元字串中讀取器的位置無法變更，因為無法復原，和可存取只能由重新初始化。Because the position of the reader in the string cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 若要避免這種情況，請使用讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。To avoid such a situation, use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案的屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#2)]

span.span: The current reader is closed.

exception.span: 沒有足夠記憶體可為傳回的字串配置緩衝區。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> ReadLineAsync ();

public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::String ^> ^ ReadLineAsync();

summary.span: 自目前字串非同步讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

span.span: Reads a line of characters asynchronously from the current string and returns the data as a string.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含字串讀取器中的下一行，或者是（如果已經讀取所有字元）。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the next line from the string reader, or is if all the characters have been read.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式從字串一次讀取一行。The following example shows how to read one line at a time from a string asynchronously. summary.span: 讀取從目前位置到字串末端的所有字元，並將它們以單一字串傳回。

span.span: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the string and returns them as a single string.

returns.span: 基礎字串從目前位置至結尾的內容。

span.span: The content from the current position to the end of the underlying string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 如果目前的方法會擲回，基礎字串中的讀取器的位置進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經讀入內部的字元數緩衝區會被捨棄。If the current method throws an , the reader's position in the underlying string is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 已讀取的字元字串中讀取器的位置無法變更，因為無法復原，和可存取只能由重新初始化。Because the position of the reader in the string cannot be changed, the characters already read are unrecoverable, and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 若要避免這種情況，請使用讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。To avoid such a situation, use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案的屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
